mapper.insert: insert into miaosha_activity (pname, startTime, num, isEnd) values (#{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isEnd,jdbcType=BIT})
